Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat (black-figured) pottery bowl; interior: streaky glaze with one red band lined in white; exterior: cream slip; part of a lion with raised paw pursuing a running part goose to left; below, band with added red and white stripes; red paint on neck of lion and on lower belly and wing of goose; incised rosette in field.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.929)
